member.name: T:FTTLib.FileCategory
member.summary: File Category enumerator for generalized file type identification

member.name: F:FTTLib.FileCategory.Archive
member.summary: Any file that can be extracted into several files

member.name: F:FTTLib.FileCategory.Audio
member.summary: Any file that can only contain an audio stream

member.name: F:FTTLib.FileCategory.Binary
member.summary: Any file that is unclassified or does not have a text representation

member.name: F:FTTLib.FileCategory.Code
member.summary: Any file that contains instructions that are compilable or machine-readable

member.name: F:FTTLib.FileCategory.Document
member.summary: Any file that is designed for conveying structured information between people

member.name: F:FTTLib.FileCategory.Image
member.summary: Any file that can only contain a single image or series of images

member.name: F:FTTLib.FileCategory.PDF
member.summary: Any file that is considered a document archive format

member.name: F:FTTLib.FileCategory.Presentation
member.summary: Any file that is designed for electronic presentations consisting of a series of separate pages or slides

member.name: F:FTTLib.FileCategory.Spreadsheet
member.summary: Any file in which data is arranged in rows and columns and can be manipulated and used in calculations

member.name: F:FTTLib.FileCategory.Text
member.summary: Any file that is not classified under another category and is not binary

member.name: F:FTTLib.FileCategory.Video
member.summary: Any file that is designed to be a container for a video stream

member.name: T:FTTLib.FTT
member.summary: Methods for translating between mime-types and file extensions

member.name: M:FTTLib.FTT.GetMimeType(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the mime type for the given file name
member.param: A file name, file extension or file path specification

member.name: M:FTTLib.FTT.GetMimeTypeFileExtensions(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a list of possible file extensions for the given mime type

member.name: M:FTTLib.FTT.GetFileCategory(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a file category for the given file name
member.param: A file name, file extension or file path specification
